original_text: And every creature which is in heaven, and on the earth, and under the earth, and such as are in the sea, and all that are in them, heard I saying, Blessing, and honour, and glory, and power, be unto him that sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb for ever and ever.
korean_text: 내가 또 들으니 하늘 위에와 땅 위에와 땅 아래와 바다 위에와 또 그 가운데 모든 피조물이 이르되 보좌에 앉으신 이와 어린 양에게 찬송과 존귀와 영광과 권능을 세세토록 돌릴지어다 하니

sentences.original_text: And every creature which is in heaven
and such as are in the sea
and all that are in them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 안에 있는 모든 것은

sentences.original_text: Blessing, and honour, and glory, and power
be unto him that sitteth upon the throne
